comment:
* A sub-class of {@link HandwritingGesture} for inserting text at the defined insertion point.
 * This class holds the information required for insertion of text in
 * toolkit widgets like {@link TextView}.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public String getTextToInsert()
methods.comment:
Returns the text that will be inserted at {@link #getInsertionPoint()}. When text is
     * empty, cursor should be moved the insertion point. *

methods.name: public PointF getInsertionPoint()
methods.comment:
* Returns the insertion point {@link PointF} (in screen coordinates) where
     * {@link #getTextToInsert()} will be inserted.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Used to package this object into a {@link Parcel}.
     *
     * @param dest The {@link Parcel} to be written.
     * @param flags The flags used for parceling.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
